SELECT U.ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_WRITER_NAME, INQUIRY_WRITER_EMAIL, INQUIRY_DATE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, A.ID FROM TBL_INQUIRY I JOIN TBL_ANSWER A ON I.ID = A.INQUIRY_ID
회원 회원 ID(PK) USER_ID(PK) N/A NUMBER NOT NULL 이메일 USER_EMAIL N/A VARCHAR2(500) NOT NULL 비밀번호 USER_PASSWORD N/A VARCHAR2(1000) NOT NULL 회원성명 USER_NAME N/A VARCHAR2(1000) NOT NULL 회원 별명 USER_NINCKNAME N/A VARCHAR2(1000) NOT NULL 회원 타입 USER_TYPE N/A VARCHAR2(500) NOT NULL 한줄소개 USER_INTRO N/A VARCHAR2(1000) NULL 휴대폰번호 USER_PHONE N/A VARCHAR2(500) NOT NULL 회원상태 USER_STATUS N/A VARCHAR2(500) NOT NULL
